analysis.description:
NBACrypto.teamsAreInitiated (/unique_chucks/13/0x7dbe2567998b3f3ee6868804ba578cab91d1c0b4.sol#29) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- InitiateTeams (/unique_chucks/13/0x7dbe2567998b3f3ee6868804ba578cab91d1c0b4.sol#182-220)
teamId in NBACrypto.purchasePlayer (/unique_chucks/13/0x7dbe2567998b3f3ee6868804ba578cab91d1c0b4.sol#85) is a local variable never initialiazed

NBACrypto.ceoAddress should be constant (/unique_chucks/13/0x7dbe2567998b3f3ee6868804ba578cab91d1c0b4.sol#5-6)
NBACrypto.cfoAddress should be constant (/unique_chucks/13/0x7dbe2567998b3f3ee6868804ba578cab91d1c0b4.sol#6-8)
NBACrypto.playersAreInitiated should be constant (/unique_chucks/13/0x7dbe2567998b3f3ee6868804ba578cab91d1c0b4.sol#30-32)
NBACrypto.teamsAreInitiated should be constant (/unique_chucks/13/0x7dbe2567998b3f3ee6868804ba578cab91d1c0b4.sol#29)

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/13/0x7dbe2567998b3f3ee6868804ba578cab91d1c0b4.sol:
